DESC.PARA: The blackbody function, taking the functional form:

PARA.EQUATION: f(x) = (ampl * refer**5 * [exp(1.438786E8 / temperature / refer) - 1]) / (x**5 * [exp(1.438786E8 / temperature / x) - 1])

ROW.DATA: Position of peak of blackbody curve, in Angstroms
Temperature of the blackbody, in Kelvins
